speaker: mole
dialog: YO YO HE’S STILL BREATHING!!! WELCOME BACK HOMIE

speaker: frog
dialog: Huh, I’m still alive…! But it’s not like this game has a HEALTH POINTS system or COMBAT.

speaker: cat
dialog: Wha--? You’re talkin’ funny! I don’t like that.

speaker: frog
dialog: Haha, it’s okay, you don’t have to understand. :) There’s no EXP in this game either. :))
